featured.text: Future plans include a cooperative effort among many nations to stop littering in space and to clean up the trash already there.

definition.zh_def: 一個擁有共同文化、語言、歷史或地理的人民組成的政治實體。
definition.en_def: A political entity composed of a group of people who share a common culture, language, history, or geography.
definition.example: The nation celebrated its independence day with parades and fireworks.
